description:
Reach your weight-loss and exercise goals with these tools:
•A full workout circuit and meal plan to start you on your journey.
•Complete exercise circuits with instruction from Jillian!
•Fat-burning exercises to tone and slim your body.
•Calorie Counter and Food and Fitness Journal to track your progress and motivate you.
•Barcode Scanner will automatically track nutrition facts from your packaged foods.
•Daily tips from Jillian will keep you on track!
•Weight Tracker helps you visualize your progress and stay motivated!
•Weekly podcasts from “The Jillian Michaels Show.”

Or become a subscriber and get even more:
•Personalized Jillian Michaels fitness plan with custom exercises and workouts, based on your body type and goals.
•Customized meal based on your eating habits and goals.
•170 exercises ALL WITH easy-to-follow video instruction from Jillian.
•1,000+ delicious and metabolism-boosting recipes.
•Community support with thousands of active members through Jillian’s message boards.
•Walk & Run Tracker with motivational voice messages from JILLIAN!  Her signature tough-love will keep you moving, as you track steps, distance, speed and calories burned.  This app uses the GPS in your iPhone to track walks, runs, bike rides, and more!
•Membership to JillianMichaels.com sync your app completely with the website and get unlimited access to 100s more recipes, diet tips,  workouts, fitness-advice and exercise videos, custom meal plans, food and fitness tracking journal, dining out guide, calorie counter, interactive weight tracker, weight-loss buddies, wellness tools and so much more!
•No Ads!
•Your choice of billing plans: $3.99/ week, $14.99/ month or just $79.99/ year.  Just use your iTunes login to subscribe and pay!  Your upgrade will auto-renew each billing period.  Auto-renew may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

Discover In-App Purchases to Target Your Personal Goals:
•Not ready to subscribe?  Buy exercise packs to target and  transform your back, butt, lower body, torso/ core or your total body with Jillian’s expert coaching and moves!
•Walk & Run Tracker

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: Jillian Michaels Slim-Down: Weight Loss, Diet, & Exercise Solution
trackName: Jillian Michaels Slim-Down: Weight Loss, Diet, & Exercise Solution
releaseNotes:
•Full day of circuit training and meal planning - FREE!            
•Step-by-step video walk through of your circuit with custom-calorie calculation.
•Automatically add circuits and calories burned to your Fitness Journal when you finish the exercises.
•Improved navigation and simplified user interface.
•Multiple billing options, including two new options: monthly and annual subscriptions.
